t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Click Manage in the Brand Registry main menu, then click Manage intellectual property. Select the brand name from the drop-down menu, then click Connect a trademark.

t: r/FulfillmentByAmazon on Reddit: Anyone on here working for a brand or manufacturer as “the Amazon Person”?
How to Find Amazon Suppliers: Product Sourcing for Amazon Made Easy
s: January 25, 2023 - Custom-made Products: Unlike other suppliers, manufacturers can customize products to suit your brand. So, if you intend to sell private label products on Amazon, sourcing from manufacturers is your best bet.
Online shopping for Our Brands Directory: Amazon Private Brands at Amazon.com

t: Retailer Listing Brand and Manufacturer as themselves - Selling on Amazon - Amazon Seller Forums
s: March 31, 2015 - Hello, Recently I noticed that there was a suggested product similar to a product I have listed. From the picture, I saw that it was from the same manufacturer. After looking at the picture, listing, title, and bullet points, I am 100% certain that it is the same brand that I am selling.

November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: How to Find Manufacturers for Amazon Products | Viral Launch
s: March 2, 2025 - You've started your Amazon business; time to find a manufacturer. Viral Launch explains how to find manufacturers for your Amazon FBA business.
